author: elena
msg: Implementation of some features for DOM L3 Core/LS.

author: elena
msg: - Added xni PSVI interfaces for light-psvi support - those are not final and
maybe modified in the nearest future.
- Modified DOM interfaces to fix known bugs - ls/as modules

author: sandygao
msg: There are special characters copied from the spec. Some editors might have
difficulty dealing with them. Now I'm removing these special characters.

author: sandygao
msg: Update xs package to use the new ValidationContext/State, so that the classes
can tell the DV implementation whether facet checking or id/idref/entity checking is necessary.
